bibl.title: The Early Christian Churches of Tebtunis Discovered by the Italian Mission in 1930-1933.

Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause
bibl.author: GROSSMANN, Peter

bibl.note: Three churches dated more or less to the VIIth century A.D. Practically nothing is visible of them today.
GROSSMANN Peter, The Early Christian Churches of Tebtunis Discovered by the Italian Mission in 1930-1933.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 197-208, 9 figg., 1 plan.
